title: Change User Type to Artist
name: Change_User_Type_to_Artist
description:
Request Parameters



Endpoint

Header.description: Required. A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service

BodyParameters.description: Optional. The Artist name shown to public if it's not given the user name will be shown.
Required. The Artist's Overview shown to public

Response.description:
On success, the HTTP status code in the response header is 200 OK and the response body contains a confirmation sent to the Spotify Admins
On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object.

title: Create a new account
name: Create_a_new_account
description:
add new user.

Request parameters



Endpoint

Header.description: Required. The content type of the request body: application/json

Body Parameters.description: Required. The email of the user (which is unique).
Required. The type of new user ( m:male or f:female).
Required. The birthday of a new user

Response.description: On success, the response body contains the created user object in JSON format and the HTTP status code in the response header is 200 OK or 201 Created. There is also a Location response header giving the Web API endpoint for the new user. On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object. Trying to create a user when you do not have the user’s authorization returns error 403 Forbidden.

title: make user free
name: make_user_free
description:
make user free.

Request parameters



Endpoint

Header.description: Required. A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service

Response.description: On success, the response body contains the user_id and credit card and the HTTP status code in the response header is 200 OK or 201 Created. There is also a Location response header giving the Web API endpoint for promote . On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object. Trying to promote when you do not have the user’s authorization returns error 403 Forbidden.

title: make user premium
name: make_user_premium

promote user to premium.

Endpoint

Body parameters.description: Required.boolean if for month or for year (if need -can be change to number from (1--->12) if for 3 month or 2 ,else)

Response.description: On success, the response body contains the user_id and credit card and the HTTP status code in the response header is 200 OK or 201 Created. There is also a Location response header giving the Web API endpoint for promote . On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object. Trying to promote when you do not have the user’s authorization returns error 403 Forbidden.

Endpoint

Header.description: Required. A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service

title: Change a Artist's Details
name: Change_a_Artist's_Details
description:
update artist info

Change a Artist's Details Change a Artist’s name and genre and info .

Note that the request data is a JSON string, not separate fields

Request parameters



Endpoint

Header.description: Required. A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service
Required if URIs are passed in the request body, otherwise ignored. The content type of the request body: application/json

Body Parameters.description: Optional. The new name for the Artist
Optional.types of most artist's track example " genre1,genre2,genre3"

Response.description: On success the HTTP status code in the response header is 200 OK. On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object. Trying to change an artist when you do not have the user’s authorization returns error 403 Forbidden.

title: create queue
name: Create_queue
description:
create queue for user

create the user playback queue

Request parameters



Endpoint

Header.description: Required. A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service

path parameters.description: required.the id of the source if playlist or album but if you will send an array of track not playlist and not album but it by any value you need and put tracksIds with array of tracks

query Parameters.description: optional. is boolean determine if the source of queue is playlist or album &true is playlist &false album

Body Parameters.description: optional if you will send array write the the name which define this tracks
optional if you will send array tracks

examples.title: Example usage
examples.content:
curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:3000/api/createQueue/5e8cbe527f37604d583f8d5c/5e8cba447f37604d583f8d3b?isPlaylist=true' \
--header 'x-auth-token: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI1ZThjYjExODA4NGE5ZDJlNmM4ZjIxZDciLCJwcm9kdWN0IjoiZnJlZSIsInVzZXJUeXBlIjoiQXJ0aXN0IiwiaWF0IjoxNTg2NTk3MDk4LCJleHAiOjQ3MzMwODM0OTh9.uP8Qm7K7537QBib4HGVEG1BF_Neb-o8EGeSRwwDwbRM' \
OR
curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:3000/api/createQueue/0/5eb1acf0371bc537ec792bbe' \
--header 'x-auth-token: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI1ZWIwOTAwYTMwYTlhMDFmMTQ0YjcyMzMiLCJwcm9kdWN0IjoicHJlbWl1bSIsInVzZXJUeXBlIjoiQXJ0aXN0IiwiaWF0IjoxNTg5MzgyNDc0LCJleHAiOjQ3MzU4Njg4NzR9.wGYAj-M2tedMOutlO2BCyoGw3XhZzHaMDSH3m8sAJq0' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
	
     "sourceType":"ratio",
     "tracksIds":["5eb1a5b3a5ebd959e08d5746","5eb1acf0371bc537ec792bbe","5eb0a55eec0c444e9c48982f","5eb0a5a1ec0c444e9c489834","5eb0a5e3ec0c444e9c489839"]
          
}
'

title: upload tracks
name: upload_tracks_to_album
description:
upload tracks by artist to specific album, only artist with valid album can upload track to this album

Request parameters



Endpoint

Path Parameters.description: the album id to which track will be added

form-data.description: Required the hight qaulity version of the track
Required the medium qaulity version of the track
Required the low qaulity version of the track
Required the hight qaulity encrypted version of the track
Required the medium qaulity encrypted version of the track
Required the low qaulity encrypted version of the track
Required the review track to be shown for android

Query Parameters.description: Required. comma seperated string with available markets for track
Required. comma seperated string with genre of track
Required. encryption key used to encrypt the track
Required. encryption key id used to encrypt the track

Response.description: 200 if success,403 forbidden if not an artist or doesn't own the album or 404 if failed to upload the track

Header.description: Required. A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service

title: delete Current User's Profile
name: delete_Current_User's_Profile
description:
delete current user profile.

Request Parameters



Endpoint

Header.description:
Required. A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service.
The access token must have been issued on behalf of the current user.
Reading the user’s email address requires the user-read-email scope;
reading country and product subscription level requires the user-read-private scope.

Response.description:
On success, the HTTP status code in the response header is 200 OK and the response body contains a success object in JSON format.
On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object.
When requesting fields that you don’t have the user’s authorization to access, it will return error 403 Forbidden.

title: update Current User's Profile
name: update_Current_User's_Profile
description:
update current user profile.

Request Parameters



Endpoint

Header.description:
Required. A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service.
The access token must have been issued on behalf of the current user.
Reading the user’s email address requires the user-read-email scope;
reading country and product subscription level requires the user-read-private scope.

Body Parameters.description: optional. email to be updated to, should be new email and not already existing one.

Body parameters.description: optional if for month or for year (if need -can be change to number from (1--->12) if for 3 month or 2 ,else)

Response.description:
On success, the HTTP status code in the response header is 200 OK and the response body contains a success object in JSON format.
On error, the header status code is an error code and the response body contains an error object.
When requesting fields that you don’t have the user’s authorization to access, it will return error 403 Forbidden.

examples.title: Example usage
examples.content:
url --location --request PUT 'http://localhost:3000/api/me/update' \
--header 'x-auth-token: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI1ZThjYjExODA4NGE5ZDJlNmM4ZjIxZDciLCJwcm9kdWN0IjoiZnJlZSIsInVzZXJUeXBlIjoiQXJ0aXN0IiwiaWF0IjoxNTg3NTg3ODcxLCJleHAiOjQ3MzQwNzQyNzF9.K3X2eOVhdvgpWqpTBTVEdqAr8ukiT7hZAne5OpLgztA' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \

--data-raw '{
	"Email": "ayaabohadima@gmail.com",
        "Password": "123456",
        "Country": "Eg",
        "Display_Name": "Aya Samir",
        //if premium can send 
        "expiresDate":"2020-12-09",
        "cardNumber": "374245455400126",
        "isMonth": true
}'
